classification.application_scope: Industrial / Commercial applications up to 2000 kW

overview.headline: Primary level, two-stage surge protection for IEEE Category C locations
overview.primary_marketing_paragraph: From the main distribution panel it isolates your sensitive downline equipment from nearby switching motor loads and in-house surges to provide a complete grid of non-degrading surge protection. SurgePure always preserves your assets and maximizes your long-term reliability and profits!
overview.technical_summary: The SurgePure Mach 5 SPD System is a primary level, two-stage, Dual-Mode surge protection device designed for high-energy electrical environments and severe surge exposure, particularly in mixed-voltage Hi-Leg systems.

key_features: Your most vital primary level defense against today’s rolling blackouts and brownouts!
Unique Dual-Mode fuse-links maintain safety of non-degrading surge capacity.
Designed for easy mounting and installation for fast response-time protection.
Up to one million amps of two-stage, single-element parallel surge protection.
Unique safety Surge Cushion technology reduces electrical noise and pollution.

safety_and_compliance.safety_rating_statement: Safety rated as SPD Type 1 & Type 2 with the TVSS industry’s highest safety SCCR rating of 200kAIC
safety_and_compliance.overcurrent_protection: Type 1 & Type 2, no breaker required / use 40 amp breaker for fast panel installations (CODE RULE 26-420)

status_and_options.status_indicators: Lifetime Green LED Self Test Protection Status Monitors for Each Phase
optional_features: Remote Aware (Opt.) provides auto-remote protection status alert

source.notes: Hi-Leg configuration with two-stage Dual-Mode protection
